name: df-mvsb
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(cmvsb, cmpt(s0, universe, coprab(s1, s2, s3, w3a(wa(wcel(cv(s1), crn(cfv(cmsub, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cmvl, cv(s0)))), wral(s4, cfv(cmvar, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), cdm(cfv(cmevl, cv(s0))), cfv(cv(s1), cfv(cfv(cmvh, cv(s0)), cv(s4))))), wceq(cv(s3), cmpt(s4, cfv(cmvar, cv(s0)), co(cv(s2), cfv(cmevl, cv(s0)), cfv(cv(s1), cfv(cfv(cmvh, cv(s0)), cv(s4))))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ mVSubst =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ { < < s1, s2 >, s3 > |((s1 ‚àà ran((mSubst ` s0))‚àß s2 ‚àà(mVL ` s0))‚àß ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà(mVR ` s0), s2[dom((mEval ` s0))](s1 `((mVH ` s0)` s4)))‚àß s3 =(s4 ‚àà(mVR ` s0)‚Ü¶(s2[(mEval ` s0)](s1 `((mVH ` s0)` s4)))))})
comment: Define substitution applied to a valuation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2016.)
